content: thumb increase will be completed on odd numbered rounds the purl stitches for the thumb gusset will continue to be on the even numbered rounds ● modification suggestion during the wrist ribbing section work a total of 16 rounds in k2 x p2 ribbing ● modification suggestion after the wrist ribbing work ten rounds of knitting prior to starting the thumb gusset live your best life and protect your peace ❤ 7 © 2026 helen bingham designs this pattern may not be copied and the finished garment may not be sold
